verse.name: c1
verse.lines: The Bible stands tho' the hills may tumble, newline It will firmly stand when the earth shall crumble. newline I will plant my feet on its firm foundation, newline For the Bible stands, the Bible stands.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The Bible stands like a rock undaunted, newline Mid the raging storms of time. newline Its pages burn with the truth eternal, newline And they glow with a light sublime.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The Bible stands like a mountain towering, newline Far above the works of man. newline Its truth by none ever was refuted, newline And destroy it they never can.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The Bible stands, and it will forever, newline When the world has passed away. newline By inspiration it has been given, newline All its precepts I will obey.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The Bible stands every test we give it, newline For its Author is divine. newline By grace alone I expect to live it, newline And to prove it and make it mine.
